title: Pleasing Matter Dua
description: Authentic supplications for Pleasing Matter Dua
seoContent: Authentic invocations and supplications for Pleasing Matter Dua. Derived from reliable sources including Hisnul Muslim.

items.title: Dua 242
items.arabic: ((كَانَ النَّبيُّ صلى الله عليه وسلم إِذَا أَتَاهُ أَمْرٌ يَسُرُّهُ أَوْ يُسَرُّ بِهِ خَرَّ سَاجِداً شُكْراً لِلَّهِ تَبَارَكَ وَتَعَالَى)).
items.translation: The Prophet PBUH would prostrate in gratitude to Allah upon receiving news which pleased him or which caused pleasure.
